# Code of Conduct

## Purpose
This repository exists SOLELY for security verification of our website code.

## Acceptable Behavior
- Viewing code to verify no IP logging
- Discussing security aspects
- Reporting genuine security concerns

## Unacceptable Behavior  
- Copying or redistributing code
- Claiming this work as your own
- Creating derivative works
- Posting this code elsewhere

## Consequences
Violators will be:
1. Reported for copyright infringement
2. Subject to DMCA takedown requests
3. Banned from CDMCS services
